body_html: Ok thanks a lot. I did not know that TF keeps a copy of the init values as a constant in the graph and I was not aware of assign_from_values as it is not in the docs yet. From now on I will use assign_from_values and save some memory.

body: Ok thanks a lot. I did not know that TF keeps a copy of the init values as a constant in the graph and I was not aware of assign_from_values as it is not in the docs yet. From now on I will use assign_from_values and save some memory.
